title: Property Transfer Document: Ananiah Gives Tamut Part of a House
description:
Papyrus 4, Ananiah Gives Tamut Part of a House. Recto, 24 lines of text. The document was written by Mauziah son of Nathan. Blank areas at top and bottom. Small gaps at top of papyrus. Verso, single line of text.
Condition: Seal missing. Cord loose. Papyrus slightly broken at folds but practically intact.
dimensions:
a: Small Box of Fragments: 1 3/4 x 4 1/16 x 4 1/16 in. (4.5 x 10.3 x 10.3 cm)
b: Frame: 25 15/16 x 14 3/4 in. (65.9 x 37.4 cm)
b: Object: 11 3/16 x 22 3/8 in. (28.4 x 56.9 cm)
credit_line: Bequest of Theodora Wilbour from the collection of her father, Charles Edwin Wilbour

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
